result.arabic_text: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا
result.translation: Twaranahoneje Bene Aadi barungikiwe Huudi, Bene Thamuudi barungikiwe Swalehe na Beniriba, hamwe rero n’iyindi migwi myinshi y’abantu yagiye irabaho hagati y’iyo migwi, ikagarariza Intumwa yarungikiwe;
